languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, помните слухи о группе офицеров, обсуждающих появление предыдущего Вольного Торговца на борту? Тогда аномалию якобы видели всего несколько человек в разных отсеках — на расстоянии километров друг от друга. Однако в этот раз очевидцев сотни, и все донесения идут с нижних палуб корабля".

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-капитан, помните слухи о группе офицеров, обсуждающих появление предыдущего Вольного Торговца на борту? Тогда аномалию якобы видели всего несколько человек в разных отсеках — на расстоянии километров друг от друга. Однако в этот раз очевидцев сотни, и все донесения идут с нижних палуб корабля".

languages.text: "Lord Captain, do you remember the rumours about a group of officers discussing the reappearance of the late Rogue Trader on board? Then the anomaly was allegedly seen by only a few people in different compartments kilometres away from each. However, this time there are hundreds of eyewitnesses, and all the reports are coming from the lower decks."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, помните слухи о группе офицеров, обсуждающих появление предыдущего Вольного Торговца на борту? Тогда аномалию якобы видели всего несколько человек в разных отсеках — на расстоянии километров друг от друга. Однако в этот раз очевидцев сотни, и все донесения идут с нижних палуб корабля".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, do you remember the rumors about a group of officers discussing the return of the late Rogue Trader on board? Then the anomaly was allegedly seen by only a few people in different compartments — at a distance of kilometers from each other. However, this time there are hundreds of eyewitnesses, and all reports come from the lower decks of the voidship."

"Lord Captain, do you remember the rumors about a group of officers discussing the return of the late Rogue Trader on board? Then the anomaly was allegedly seen by only a few people in different compartments — at a distance of kilometers from each other. However, this time there are hundreds of eyewitnesses, and all reports come from the lower decks of the voidship."

"Lord Captain, do you remember the rumours about a group of officers discussing the reappearance of the late Rogue Trader on board? Then the anomaly was allegedly seen by only a few people in different compartments miles away from each. However, this time there are hundreds of eyewitnesses, and all the reports are coming from the lower decks."

"Lord Captain, do you remember the rumours about a group of officers discussing the reappearance of the late Rogue Trader on board? Then the anomaly was allegedly seen by only a few people in different compartments miles away from each. However, this time there are hundreds of eyewitnesses, and all the reports are coming from the lower decks."

"Lord Captain, do you remember the rumours about a group of officers discussing the reappearance of the late Rogue Trader on board? Then the anomaly was allegedly seen by only a few people in different compartments kilometres away from each. However, this time there are hundreds of eyewitnesses, and all the reports are coming from the lower decks."

languages.text: “舰长大人，您还记得之前有一群军官讨论，说有人看到已故的行商浪人西奥多拉夫人出现在船上吗？在那之后，又有几个人在不同的船舱看到了这样的异常现象，而且那些船舱之间相隔数里。不过，这次的异象有几百名目击者，而且所有的报告都来自下层甲板。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, do you remember the rumours about a group of officers discussing the reappearance of the late Rogue Trader on board? Then the anomaly was allegedly seen by only a few people in different compartments kilometres away from each. However, this time there are hundreds of eyewitnesses, and all the reports are coming from the lower decks."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，您还记得之前有一群军官讨论，说有人看到已故的行商浪人西奥多拉夫人出现在船上吗？在那之后，又有几个人在不同的船舱看到了这样的异常现象，而且那些船舱之间相隔数里。不过，这次的异象有几百名目击者，而且所有的报告都来自下层甲板。”

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, ¿recuerda que mencioné que un grupo de oficiales afirmaba haber visto a la difunta Comerciante Independiente a bordo? En aquel momento, la anomalía solo fue presenciada por unas pocas personas en compartimentos diferentes separados por kilómetros. Sin embargo, ahora hay cientos de testigos y todos los informes vienen de las cubiertas inferiores».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, do you remember the rumours about a group of officers discussing the reappearance of the late Rogue Trader on board? Then the anomaly was allegedly seen by only a few people in different compartments kilometres away from each. However, this time there are hundreds of eyewitnesses, and all the reports are coming from the lower decks."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, ¿recuerda que mencioné que un grupo de oficiales afirmaba haber visto a la difunta Comerciante Independiente a bordo? En aquel momento, la anomalía solo fue presenciada por unas pocas personas en compartimentos diferentes separados por kilómetros. Sin embargo, ahora hay cientos de testigos y todos los informes vienen de las cubiertas inferiores».

languages.text: "Lord Captain, erinnert Ihr Euch an die Gerüchte über eine Gruppe von Offizieren, die über die Rückkehr der verstorbenen Freihändlerin an Bord diskutierten? Damals wurde die Anomalie angeblich nur von einigen Leuten in verschiedenen Abteilungen gesehen, die jeweils Kilometer voneinander entfernt waren. Diesmal aber gibt es Hunderte von Augenzeugen, und alle Berichte kommen von den unteren Decks."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, do you remember the rumours about a group of officers discussing the reappearance of the late Rogue Trader on board? Then the anomaly was allegedly seen by only a few people in different compartments kilometres away from each. However, this time there are hundreds of eyewitnesses, and all the reports are coming from the lower decks."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, do you remember the rumours about a group of officers discussing the reappearance of the late Rogue Trader on board? Then the anomaly was allegedly seen by only a few people in different compartments miles away from each. However, this time there are hundreds of eyewitnesses, and all the reports are coming from the lower decks."

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, vous souvenez-vous des rumeurs au sujet de la réapparition à bord de la précédente libre-marchande ? L'anomalie n'avait alors été vue que par une poignée de personnes dans des compartiments situés à des kilomètres les uns des autres. Mais cette fois, nous avons des centaines de témoins, et tous les rapports nous proviennent des ponts inférieurs. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, do you remember the rumours about a group of officers discussing the reappearance of the late Rogue Trader on board? Then the anomaly was allegedly seen by only a few people in different compartments kilometres away from each. However, this time there are hundreds of eyewitnesses, and all the reports are coming from the lower decks."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, vous souvenez-vous des rumeurs au sujet de la réapparition à bord de la précédente libre-marchande ? L'anomalie n'avait alors été vue que par une poignée de personne dans des compartiments situés à des kilomètres les uns des autres. Mais cette fois, nous avons des centaines de témoins, et tous les rapports nous proviennent des ponts inférieurs. »

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、亡き自由開拓者が船に再び姿を現したと、士官達が集まって話していたという噂を覚えていますか？当時その妙な出来事は、どれも数キロ離れた別々の区画で、目撃者も数人という話でした。ですが今回は目撃者が何百人もいて、報告はすべて下層デッキからあがっています」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, do you remember the rumours about a group of officers discussing the reappearance of the late Rogue Trader on board? Then the anomaly was allegedly seen by only a few people in different compartments kilometres away from each. However, this time there are hundreds of eyewitnesses, and all the reports are coming from the lower decks."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、亡き自由開拓者が船に再び姿を現したと、士官達が集まって話していたという噂を覚えていますか？当時その妙な出来事は、どれも数キロ離れた別々の区画で、目撃者も数人という話でした。ですが今回は目撃者が何百人もいて、報告はすべて下層デッキからあがっています」

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, bir grup subayın merhum Hür Tacir'i gemide görüldüğüne dair söylentiler üzerine konuştuklarını hatırlıyor musunuz? O sırada bu anomali, aralarında kilometreler bulunan farklı kompartımanlardaki birkaç kişi tarafından görülmüştü. Bu sefer ise yüzlerce görgü tanığı var. Tüm raporlarsa alt güvertelerden geliyor."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, do you remember the rumours about a group of officers discussing the reappearance of the late Rogue Trader on board? Then the anomaly was allegedly seen by only a few people in different compartments kilometres away from each. However, this time there are hundreds of eyewitnesses, and all the reports are coming from the lower decks."
